thread.section_title: WTSmedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WTSmedia | www.wtsmedia.com
thread.title: Joyce Vespie Weaver
thread.title_full: WTSmedia reviewed by Joyce Vespie Weaver

author: Joyce Vespie Weaver
title: Joyce Vespie Weaver
text: WTS Media and Mr. Larry Russell came highly recommended by a friend. Having tried a couple of other companies, I found them difficult to work with. After contacting Mr. Russell, he assisted me through the entire process. He was in contact with me via email and also some by personal phone calls with updates on the project. WTS Media is very professional, highly accurate and the 'turn around time' was amazing! When more product was needed... I contacted Mr. Russell and the product arrived at my home before the weekend.
